values: wow, so much has happened. i dont even know where to start. im still working like a fiend. at first it was hard to be working so much and away from everything. but now, now im numb to it all. im not at ict or dash anymore. which, mind you, is completely my own decision, i feel as though i dont need to allow my life to be revolved around god at this point. i need to explore everything before i can just decide like that. hmm. i dont know. its nuts. ive basically just been working. after work i usually hang out with matt and everyone. it seems crazy how the kid who i thought was crazy because he asked me out every weekend at minerva, would be my boyfriend. haha, its nuts. its even crazier to think that we've been together for a month already. thats really all ive been doing, but having an awesome time while doing it. this whole college thing is becoming impossible to me. where to go? what to do with my life? getting out completely? or being close to home? there are far too many damn questions for me to answer. i just dont understand. i have it narrowed down to two. i think.... maybe not. i guess ill see. contrary to recent decisions, malone is still a very prominent option. maybe when im there, ill be able to better decide what the hell to follow. if not malone, than kent. and let me tell ya, kent is looking pretty good right now. not too far, not too close. a bigger school. the majors i desire. tons of people i know going there. which isnt necessarily a good thing. but, as for now i must go. im going shopping before work. working on life... ::sigh:: all the changes...

all right. so i just read alis journal, about how she doesnt think shes ready for a big change and whatnot. first of all, i just wanna say that i think shes more ready than she thinks. but, nonetheless, ive been thinking. yeh, i know, this again. when i think, something comes over me and i just write. not necessarily sure of what i mean by anything. all i know is that ive been pushing anything high school related away from me. much like ali said, i havent been myself lately. which is perhaps why all of our conversations seem empty. im at fault, i know, i just dont know how to fix it. i know im ready for a change. i get too antsy when things become "the usual." i hate that. someone asks, "whats goin on?" and my variation of answers is, "nothin really" or "the usual." it drives me insane. work is coming along. its to the point where im used to it now and dont necessarily mind it. as for college, im ready. graduation is a mere seven months away. which, in my opinion, seven months too far. dont get me wrong, im going to miss everyone. im going to miss my mom and my life here. but im much more excited to share my new life with everyone when i come back. to grow up. my independent spirit has been screaming for nearly eighteen years, and its finally going to be exposed. the only thing is that im wondering who ill become. if i will change. if ill be myself. i guess we'll find out.

hm. so plans of updating the other day were crushed. but hey, youll have that. life has been nuts lately. school is well, school. nothing difficult. just need to make sure i keep it that way and hold focus. last chance to bring up my gpa, which has been slowly drowning in a whirlpool of apathy since freshman year. finally, i found the drain plug. the thing is, i need to refind that plug for my spiritual life. its not terrible. but for some time it was nearly nonexistant. recently, ive had a few kicks to get me back in the race. and this time, my stamina is going to be better than ever. i work a lot. thats had quite a bit to do with everything. its my choice to work, but im starting to notice the consequences. and webers is opening another store. ill be transferred there i believe. we'll see how the tips are at the new place. minervas. hmm. its not bad. dont hate it. dont love it. its just work. the usual. this weekend should be nice. friday i have to work. theres some kids goin over mikes that evening. i dont think ill go. i just dont feel the same there anymore. hmm. maybe when im working less ill feel better about it. im not sure what ill do. but ill do something indeed. i was talking about dash last night. i miss it more than ict. i think im going to take a sunday off sometime so i can go. wow. i just got a freaking hot flash. this is nuts. i really dont like this. ok, its beginning to subside. what was that?! craziness. anyway. so thats friday--undecided whats going on after work. ill talk to matt. maybe we'll do something. saturday will be exciting. i have a hair appointment at eleven-fifteen. im getting something done to my hair. im not sure what yet, but i am. then, time pending, im going shopping with ali. that evening, the ict guys' are putting on a dinner for the chicks. its sweet. love those kids. i believe thats all for that evening. maybe other things going on. we'll see. sunday. church. maybe float building if theres time before i go to work at four. minerva. i hope its not busy. ill cry. i need the money, but i cant handle that much stress. ::sigh:: i need to sleep, or at least breathe. homecoming is coming up really quickly. im excited. im going with matt. :). hes awesome. i used to deny him like crazy and now i spend hours talking to him. last night we talked about how awesome God is for two hours. its awesome to see how hes so passionate about God. his sister is a freshman at my school. her name is katie. i love her so much. shes seriously the sweetest girl ever. she writes me notes and everything and gives me a hug everytime she sees me. shes even glad matts going to homecoming. its awesome how close they are. im going to invite her to ict sometime. shes cute. but yeh. i have to get ready for work. ::sigh:: ill write more...eventually. love yall. buh bye!

i havent updated seriously in quite some time now. ive been busy. and apathetic. which i dont think is necessarily a bad concept. so, i guess ill try to say something of substance.
  so about that car accident. we're ok now. i guess im just stressed out about the whole thing. my not used to being hindered in anything i do. hmm...thats all. 
  i feel like all the people that were involved are mad at me for some reason. and even when i ask them and they say no, i know something is up. worries me. i feel like im already losing touch with everyone i was so close to but weeks ago. i know its me too. ive changed. i dont know how, but i feel it. its odd. theres nothing i can do about it though. and im not sure how that makes me feel. but yes. but i am indeed a different person. maybe not completely, but in some respect. deeper, more aware of my thoughts and feelings and more apathetic about the thoughts of others. independence. yet still a child. im starting to realize that im not the way ive been oh-so nicely labeled as through high school. im discovering myself. and its awesome. i dont need to tell anyone. thats part of who i am. more self-restrained as far as confiding is concerned. i dont want to confide anymore. nothing comes of it. i shouldnt say that. not all the time. sometimes its great. other times i walk away feeling as a burden and empty. im overflowing with emotions, but vacant. its insane.
  lets see. ive been working a lot. i wasnt allowed to go into work on monday. my mom didnt want me to. i didnt mind it though. it was nice to have a night off. i worked tuesday at webers. i worked wednesday at webers. i worked thursday at webers. i worked tonight at webers. i work tomorrow. i work on sunday. i suppose im a bit stressed. however, working has become a satisfying escape. webers is opening a new location in north olmsted. itll be open all year. im transferring there. itll be nicer, cleaner and hopefully ill make more money. i wont be at ict until novemberish. dash, who knows. i dont like minerva. its not fun. the environment is ridiculously intimidating. i dont know. jamie just started there. thats cool. we dont talk much. love her though. ali still works there. i dont think she likes me very much. i did something, just undecided as of yet. hmm. thats all with that subject i think.
  i "need to have a talk with someone." or so i was told. im not sure what, but thats usually not a very good thing. went to mikes after work tonight. the one who needed to talk to me wasnt there. guys sleepover thing, felt ridicously unwelcomed at mikes for the first time. not a fan. hmm. i dont know when ill have time to talk. soon i presume. hm, pensive.
  sitting at my comp right now. ridiculously tired. waiting for my cell to ring. i wonder if it will. i have a feeling it wont. i hope so...you are so crazy go nuts cute when you laugh. haha. wow, life can bring one intriguing people. its awesome. enough about that now.
  i really dont know what else to say. i love you all. i just dont have the time and, at the moment, am not equipped for such an act. but yeh. ill talk to you all soon, im sure.
  keep it real in the lbc. thats what zach always says. i love zach. hm, ok...im done now. 
  later kids.

apparently lately ive been 'striving for attention.' i need to 'quit the small talk.' i dont know who said it, nor does it matter. but, nonetheless im not going to try to get attention over it. ive been distant lately, indeed. with no fault to others. i dont even see it as a bad thing. honestly, sometimes i just think its good to retreat from other people. if i were old enough, take a vacation. think. im a busy kid, no doubt. two jobs and whatnot. but i have no place to complain about them. it was my choice to take on a second job. its for a mere two months, but apparently im also avoiding my youth group. i dont know what to say in order to cut out the small talk. i dont know who you are, but i certainly apologize. here, an actual thought of mine: i just feel as though every sense of belonging has been stripped away from me. too young for college, too old for high school. friends...love them to death. i just feel unwanted. who knows, maybe this is anoher plea for attention. but regardless, im giving this person what they wanted--no small talk. would you like me to pour out my entire life in an online journal? i really dont know what to say anymore. i just feel like no matter what i say is going to backfire. like everything else. if i talk about it--im pleading for attention. if i dont talk about it--im being distant with mere small talk. i dont know how to deal with it. i think thats why i took the other jobs, i dont have to deal with anything. its past two am. country jam tomorrow. i should get rest.

ok...im back from shopping and whatnot. john and i went to dennys for breakfast. i couldnt eat...i already felt sick to my stomach. then we headed over to guitar center...for two hours. we actually had a lot of fun. we went in the acoustic guitar room and he played. it was amazing. we sat there for like an hour just singing and playing. it was awesome. he bought a keyboard, mic and cord thingys. ha. after we were done, we went to wal*mart. he had to buy a printer and a mattress pad. mind you, mattress pads are not that easy to find apparently. haha. joked around a lot. then it came time for us to part. i never imagined it would be so hard. we sat in his car listening to music and not saying a word. finally, we turned the music off and sat in utter silence. he reached in the back seat and handed me a teddy bear that hes had since he was a kid. then i gave him the letter i wrote him and made him promise not to read it until he was gone. i sat there...crying. then we prayed together. that we keep God as our center so we could get through this. and we know that with God, we can. after all the hesitations and long goodbyes. we finally said goodbye for the last time. then i lost it and practically ran to my door. looking back only once-for just one more glance. we're going to be fine. i know we are. the latest i would see him is three months. around thanksgiving. but, Gods awesome. so we'll be fine. nine hours isnt that far... ok thats a lie, but still. he'll be in nashville... but i have awesome friends who are here for me. makes me smile. :). ali especially knows what im goin through. i love her. i love all of them. the end. i cant do this anymore. buh bye.

year's party. last winter formal. last spring break. last luau. last time losing red day. last high-school relationships. last high-school hearbreak. last year of childhood. ict. dash. the im not sure why im writing this. im not bored. just, well, pensive i suppose. so much has become apparent to me lately. and im not really sure what to do with my thoughts. so this is where they go. cause no one really wants to listen. if they care, theyll read it. if they dont, theyll stop. and ill never know the difference. but regardless. a lot on mind mind lately. starting to realize that theres one month of summer left. my last real summer before i go to college. im a senior. last year. and im finally out. im getting to the point where im in the middle. im afraid to grow up, but afraid to stay young. i visited my college. it was so much better than i ever thought. i fell in love in the parking lot. its malone college in canton. only about one half hour away from here. which i love. i couldnt imagine leaving my youth group for very long. i love those kids and im hoping they feel the same. high school. what exactly does it mean? its name doesnt remotely warn you for the fact that it ends so quickly. that you should prepare years in advance for your future. that youll have heartbreak. and best friends. and first loves. none of that. it merely involves the word 'school' which is immediately ignored. but regardless. ignore the rant.it doesnt matter anymore because as long as it took me to realize that...i mean really realize that-its almost over. one more year of youthful innocence until im hurled into the real world with many others who are just as lost. im scared. but anxious. im going to find myself and not be afraid. but as for high school. i have high expectations for the coming year. i know we'll always have our ups and downs (my friend and i, that is) but i think that at the same time, we'll realize that its almost over and begin to unite. in my youth group. there will be about eight of us leaving. its so surreal. i really cant wait though. im excited to become and adult. im just terrified to do it alone. im so glad my best friend is going to malone with me. i know that through our faith we can get through anything. shes been such an inspiration to me without ever knowing it. i love her to death. i definitely have the most amazing friends and i feel like crying everytime i think of leaving them. as for guys--im a single chick. whether im ok with it or not is a difficult question. ive been thinking constantly about my ex-boyfriend, but im not sure for what reason. i know we're not meant to be together, but i think about him still. ha. just sitting here thinking about it has made me realize that i miss companionship more than him. and im pretty sure that the fact that i could come to that conclusion so quickly, justifies that. dont get me wrong, i have my crushes just like everyone else. and at the moment i happen to be particularly smitten with a certain boy. but the fact that i dont know nearly enough about him to say anymore than i have is self-explanitory concerning the progress. im not even sure if id like to date before college. all right, thats a lie. i would love to date before college, im just not sure if it is in anyones best interest. i was at a Bible study recently and we discussed it remotely. we talked about how after high school theres an inevitable growing period. if youre with someone, you either grow faster than they do, dont grow at all, or grow in different directions. its inevitable in most cases. i dont deal well with heartbreak. i guess i just dont want to subject myself to an unnecessary pain source.
